body.name: Dash Cam Hardwire Kit, Converts 12V-24V to 5V Type C USB Hardwire Kit for Dash Camera, Supports 24-Hour Parking Monitoring for Car DashCam (14.7FT)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 8 mins
features: 【High Compatibility】The hardware kit is designed with a 12V/24V configuration. No matter if you're driving a personal car, a commercial vehicle, or a truck. Our hardwire kit provides you with a perfect solution, and incorporating multiple protection mechanisms to effectively prevent issues, such as overcurrent, overheating, overload and short circuits. This ensures a safe and reliable user experience

【Intelligent Low-Voltage Protection】The dash cam hardwire kit is equipped with an intelligent low-voltage protection device. When the vehicle power voltage drops below a critical level, it will automatically shuts off to prevent the dash cam from draining the vehicle battery power.

【24H Parking Surveillance】After installing the hardwire kit, the dash camera will automatically power on and off with the car's ignition. If you want to enable parking surveillance, simply activate the built-in parking monitoring function of the dash cam

【Multiple Protection Mechanisms】The hardwire kit for dash cam is equipped with multiple protection functions, including over-voltage protection, low-voltage protection, short-circuit protection, and over-current protection. These protection mechanisms effectively prevent damage to the car camera and vehicle power system caused by abnormal voltage or current, thereby enhancing the stability and safety of the equipment

【Specifications of the Hardwire Kit】Dash camera hardwire kit uses a Type-C interface, with a data output of 12V/2.5A. It has an overall length of 14.7 feet and is designed with three wires, enabling true 24-hour parking surveillance

【Worry-free After-sales Service】12 Months Warranty. If you have any questions in the process of using the hardwire kit, we will provide technical support for you. If it does not work, please give us a chance, and we will provide you with satisfactory after-sales service. Welcome to contact us directly, we will provide you with 24/7 online customer service

productInformation.value: Car Power Supply Cable Hardwire Kit

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Diamond Lark Dash Dam Hardwire Kit Diamond Lark dash cam hardwire kit is meticulously crafted using carefully selected conductive and insulating materials to ensure exceptional conductivity and durability. Whether during vehicle start-stop cycles or in the face of fluctuating power grid voltages, this hardwire kit consistently delivers the required voltage to ensure the stable operation of your car dash camera. No matter the type of vehicle you're driving, our car dashcam hardwire kit offers wide applicability. It not only provides a stable and reliable power supply but also offers additional safety for your driving recordings.

Installation Steps Distinguish between ACC Power and BAT Power Start the car and use the test pen to touch a specific fuse in the car. If the indicator light of the test pen illuminates, then the power source for this fuse is ACC power. Turn off the car and use the test pen to touch another fuse in the car. If the indicator light of the test pen illuminates, then the power source for this fuse is BAT power (24-hour parking monitoring power source). Fuse Installation Insert the fuses into their corresponding sockets (pay attention to the installation positions of the hardwire kit fuse and the automotive fuse). Connect the ACC fuse to the red wire socket and connect the BAT fuse to the yellow wire socket. Connect the Power Cable Connect the red wire to the vehicle's ACC power source, connect the yellow wire to the BAT power source, and connect the black wire to any metal location on the vehicle.

Installation Precautions Please pay attention to the installation locations of the fuses included in the hard wire kit and the vehicle's fuses (illustrated instructions are provided in the instruction manual and product link).Make sure to connect the red wire to the vehicle's ACC power source, connect the yellow wire to the BAT power source, and connect the black wire to a metal location on the vehicle (ground).Ensure all connections are securely fastened to prevent loosening due to vibrations and bumps.Try to neatly conceal the cables within the vehicle to maintain interior tidiness and avoid cable interference with driving.Before connecting the power, ensure that the vehicle's battery is disconnected to prevent accidental short circuits.After completing the installation, test all functions of the dashcam, including recording and parking monitoring, to ensure everything is working properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dash Cam Wire Harness
reviews.reviewText: Used the harness to wire my dash camera. There was plenty of wire on each end of the control box, maybe too much. camera. Was supplied end connection piece for of type of fuse you may in your vehicle. The supplied connection instrument added and extra level of assurance i was getting thing connected correctly. Has worked flawlessly for 3 months. The supplied prying tools were also a good help. Watch out you are now on camers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition for my car camera
reviews.reviewText: This kit worked perfectly for the installation of my car camera. It was able to be installed so that it was hidden from ones sight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything needed comes in kit
reviews.reviewText: Very great product. Have bought from this company before. Always makes installation easier when everything is included in kits. Comes with many different fuse taps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived on time. Purchased this product to use parking mode on my Wolfbox i07 dash cam, and it worked like a charm. Have not had an issue with it since installation. I'm hopeful that it will last for a long time. Also love that they gave several extra fuses, and the fuse tester was definitely helpful in verifying connections were right. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product was easy to install verses other kits I’ve used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A better way to install a dash cam
reviews.reviewText: This kit is certainly a better way to install a dash cam or radar detector. I have never been a fan of a dangling cords plugged into USB adapters for devices that will never leave the vehicle. This kit has every thing you need to make a nice clean wiring install without needing to tap into the wiring harness. Also the fuse panel taps make it easy to get the power you need as well as "undo" the install without any issues when you do decide remove the device. The kit does have everything you need for the install, no matter what style fuse box your car has. Definitely a worthwhile purchase for any Dash cam install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, no problems. Would recommend.
